description.narrative: The PDO is to improve access to and use of quality reproductive health services by women of reproductive age, in selected regions of Mali.

Unit for Decentralization and De-concentration Support (CADD)

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article IV, Section 4.01. (a) of the Financing Agreement (FA) | Description :The government has adopted theProcedures Manual in accordance with SectionI. C.1 of Schedule 2 of the FA, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association.| Due Date :23-Nov-2012

Finance Agreement :Article IV, Section 4.01. (b) of the FA | Description :The government has recruited a firm in charge offiduciary management of the Project, including experienced and qualified procurement and financial management specialists, underterms and conditions satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :23-Nov-2012
Finance Agreement :Section II. A. 2. of Schedule 2 of the FA | Description :No later than May 31, 2014 the Recipient shall submitto the Association a mid-term report. | Due Date :31-Mar-2015

Finance Agreement :Section II. B. 4. of Schedule 2 of the FA | Description :No later than 4 months after the effective date, theRecipient shall appoint financial external and internal auditors in accordancewith the provisions of Section III of Schedule 2 ofthe FA. | Due Date :30-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Section II. B. 4. of Schedule 2 of the FA | Description :No later than two (2) months after the Effective Date,the Recipient shall install and make operational in the General Secretariat, an accounting system software for the Project, whichis acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :15-May-2013

Finance Agreement :Section IV. B. (a) of Schedule 2 of the FA | Description :No withdrawal shall be made for payments prior to thedate of the FA, except that withdrawals up to an aggregate amount not to exceed USD 250,000 equivalent may be made for paymentsmadeprior to this date, but on or after January 1, 2012 for eligible expenditures under Category (1). | Due Date :23-Nov-2012

Finance Agreement :Section IV. B. (b) of Schedule 2 of the FA | Description :No withdrawal shall be made for payments undercategory 2(a) until the Recipient has furnished to the Assoc. satisfactory evidencethat it has engaged for the RBF Pilot forReproductive Health Services an international technical assistance (TA) firm and an independent verification expert, under terms ofreference, qualifications and experience satisfactory to IDA. | Due Date :30-Nov-2014

Finance Agreement :Section IV. B. (c) of Schedule 2 of the FA | Description :No withdrawal shall be made for payments underCategory 2 (b) until the Recipient shall have furnished evidence satisfactory to theAssociation that an aggregate amount of 60,000beneficiaries have been treated in Fiscal Year 2012 and/or 2013 for one or more Reproductive Health Services listed in Part A.1 ofthe project and that all disbursements made under 2(a) were used to provide RH services. | Due Date :30-Nov-2015

Finance Agreement :Section IV. B. (e) of Schedule 2 of the FA | Description :No withdrawal shall be made for payments underCategory (3) until the Recipient shall have furnished to the Association satisfactory evidence that the Voucher Scheme Manual hasbeen issued in a manner and with content satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :31-Mar-2015UPDATE 05/25/16: During therecent mid-term review it was determined that there was not sufficient time to introduce the Voucher Scheme and it was agreed thatit would not go ahead. The MOH is currently preparing plans for the utilization of the funds not used for this Scheme, as well asother activities deleted during the MTR, and an appropriate restructuring request will be prepared once these plans have beencompleted. This covenant will be removed as part of this restructuring.

Finance Agreement :Section IV.B. (d) of Schedule 2 of the FA | Description :No withdrawal shall be made for payments under Category2(c) until the Recipient shall have furnished evidence satisfactory to the Association that an aggregate amount of 120,000beneficiaries have been treated in Fiscal Year 2014 and/or 2015 for one or more Reproductive Health Services listed in Part A.1 ofthe project and that all disbursements made under 2(b) were used to provide RH services. | Due Date :30-Nov-2016
